# Roadmap {#roadmap}

The initial __tercen.com__ was launched in the year 2020.

The following improvements are planned during year 2021.

* Better documentation, guides and videos (2021)
* Adding more operators (2021)
* improvements in the wizard __apps__ support (2021)
* Performance improvements (2021)
* Python support (2021)
